name: bicycling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly US (UK usually cycling) the activity of riding a bicycle: Bicycling has become more popular in the city. Bicycling should be for everyone, not just the young, fit, and physically daring.
More examplesFewer examplesExercise can help with minor and chronic pain - bicycling is a good option.People who advocate bicycling should have a voice when it comes to transport planning.

riding a bicycle or relating to riding bicycles: There are special lanes for bicycling commuters. He was injured in a bicycling accident.
UK used to refer to a royal family with an informal personal style, especially the royal family of the Netherlands or Sweden: She's in favour of a "bicycling monarchy" such as they have in Sweden and Holland, where the royal family behaves like ordinary people.
